languages.text: "Ради этого блеска в ваших глазах. Что делать, если так сильно вас радует только разломанное старье".

traits.locale_text: "Ради этого блеска в ваших глазах. Что делать, если так сильно вас радует только разломанное старье".

languages.text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"
languages.original_text: "Ради этого блеска в ваших глазах. Что делать, если так сильно вас радует только разломанное старье".

traits.locale_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"
"For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"
"For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"
"For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

languages.text: “因为你刚刚连眼睛都发光了。既然这件破破烂烂的垃圾是唯一能让你高兴的东西，我怎么能不给你呢？”
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

traits.locale_text: “因为你刚刚连眼睛都发光了。既然这件破破烂烂的垃圾是唯一能让你高兴的东西，我怎么能不给你呢？”

languages.text: «Por el brillo de sus ojos. ¿Cómo iba a no hacerlo, cuando la chatarra vieja es lo único que le alegra así?».
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

traits.locale_text: «Por el brillo de sus ojos. ¿Cómo iba a no hacerlo, cuando la chatarra vieja es lo único que le alegra así?».

languages.text: 「お前の目の輝きのために。壊れた古いゴミが唯一お前を喜ばせるものであれば、そうしない理由があろうか？」
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

traits.locale_text: 「お前の目の輝きのために。壊れた古いゴミが唯一お前を喜ばせるものであれば、そうしない理由があろうか？」

languages.text: « Juste pour voir vos yeux s'illuminer de la sorte. Est-ce de ma faute si vous n'avez l'air d'apprécier rien d'autre que des vieilleries délabrées ? »
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

traits.locale_text: « Juste pour voir vos yeux s'illuminer de la sorte. Est-ce de ma faute si vous n'avez l'air d'apprécier rien d'autre que des vieilleries délabrées ? »

languages.text: "Bei diesem Funkeln in den Augen. Wie hätte ich da widerstehen können, wenn doch kaputter alter Kram wie dieser das Einzige ist, was Euch offensichtlich Freude macht?"
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"

traits.locale_text: "Bei diesem Funkeln in den Augen. Wie hätte ich da widerstehen können, wenn doch kaputter alter Kram wie dieser das Einzige ist, was Euch offensichtlich Freude macht?"

languages.text: "Gözlerindeki o parıltıyı görmek için. Seni şu kırık dökük çöpten başka hiçbir şey seni böylesine sevindirmezken nasıl yapmam?"
languages.original_text: "For that gleam in your eyes. How could I not, when broken old rubbish is the only thing that delights you so?"
